analysis.description:
RefundEscrow.beneficiaryWithdraw (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#675-681) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- beneficiary.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#677-681)

Reentrancy in TokenSale._processPurchase (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(totalTokensSold <= token.balanceOf(address(this)),totalTokensSold raised must not exceed balanceOf `this`) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(totalTokensSold <= token.balanceOf(address(this)),totalTokensSold raised must not exceed balanceOf `this`)

analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenSale.finalization (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#966-977):
	External calls:
	- super.finalization() (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#967-969)
	- totalTokens = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#969-970)

	External calls:
	- super.finalization() (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#967-969)
	- totalTokens = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#969-970)
	- medianizer = medianizerProxy.medianizer() (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#970)
	- usdPerEthOnFinalize = uint256(medianizer.read()) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#970-971)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- usdPerEthOnFinalize (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#970-971)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.reverse (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#944-960):
	External calls:
	- whitelist = whitelistProxy.whitelist() (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#947-949)
	- require(bool)(! whitelist.hasRole(_account,authorized)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#949-950)

Reentrancy in TokenSale.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#960-966):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(isFinalized && goalReached(),withdrawTokens requires the TokenSale to be successfully finalized) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#961-964)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#431-440) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#435-437)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/14/0xf7ff6c8d0264a6adf6f4ba60d427beedcbe98b50.sol#448-458) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
